targets.rawSql:
SELECT imagen
	FROM vw.imagenes_grafana 
	where id = 9

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
											                      inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
											                      inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			                                      inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			                                      left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
                                            where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
											                      and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas))
											                      and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
                                            and b.principal is true
                                            and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas))
and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", count(*) as "RECIBIDOS", 
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR ATENDER",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
|| ' (' || (ROUND(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2)) || '%)'AS "ATENDIDO", 
ROUND(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and e.id_resolutorio in (371) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/
	  (SELECT count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
			left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
			and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas))
			and e.nombre in ($estado)
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8))::decimal,2) AS "PROPORCIÓN"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.category cc on cc.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and e.principal is true
and (cc.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas)) 
and b.nombre in ($estado)
and e.id_resolutorio in (371) and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) 
group by b.nombre
order by "POR ATENDER" desc

select  m.nombre || ' (' ||  b.nombre || ')'  as "MUNICIPIO", count(*) as "RECIBIDOS", 
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "POR ATENDER",
sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
|| ' (' || (ROUND(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2.5 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2)) || '%)'AS "ATENDIDO", 
ROUND(sum(CASE WHEN a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and e.id_resolutorio in (371) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/
	  (SELECT count(a.id)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
			inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
      left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
			and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas)) 
			and e.nombre in ($estado)
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8))::decimal,2) AS "PROPORCIÓN"
from gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.category cc on cc.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  a.id
left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and e.principal is true
and (cc.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas)) 
and b.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
and e.id_resolutorio in (371) and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) 
group by m.nombre, b.nombre
order by "POR ATENDER" desc

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id 
	inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
	inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
	left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
	where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
	and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas)) 
	and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
  and b.principal is true	
  and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) 
and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas)) 
and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) 
and (a.feedback >= 2.5   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select
((SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
	inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
	left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
	where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
	and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas))
  and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))
  -
  (SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371) and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas))
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6) )) as total

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.category c on c.id =  a.id_extra_categoria
			inner join gestion.estado e on e.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
			left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
			where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and b.id_resolutorio in (371)
			and (c.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas)) 
			and e.nombre in ($estado) and m.nombre in ($municipio)
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

SELECT
      a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP",
      a.nombre::Text "CODIGO",
    	e.cedula::Text "CEDULA",
    	e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO",
    	b.nombre::Text "ESTADO",
    	c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
    	d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
	  	a.fecha::Text "FECHA CREACION"
	  	FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join gestion.responsable r on r.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            left join gestion.category ca on ca.id =  a.id_adicional_categoria
      where $__timeFilter(a.fecha_registro) and r.id_resolutorio in (371) and r.principal is true
	  		    and (m.name in ($categoria) or ca.name in ($categnuevas))
	  		    and b.nombre in ($estado) and c.nombre in ($municipio)
			      and a.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
											FROM gestion.caso a
											inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
											inner join gestion.sub_categoria b on b.id = a.id_sub_categoria
											inner join gestion.extra_categoria c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
											inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
											where 
											a.id_sub_categoria = 7 and a.id_extra_categoria = 25
											and e.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
											and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.sub_categoria b on b.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.extra_categoria c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
where 
a.id_sub_categoria = 7 and a.id_extra_categoria = 25
and e.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6)

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
											FROM gestion.caso a
											inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
											inner join gestion.sub_categoria b on b.id = a.id_sub_categoria
											inner join gestion.extra_categoria c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
											inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
											where 
											a.id_sub_categoria = 7 and a.id_extra_categoria = 31
											and e.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
											and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.sub_categoria b on b.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.extra_categoria c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
where 
a.id_sub_categoria = 7 and a.id_extra_categoria = 31
and e.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6)

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
											FROM gestion.caso a
											inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
											inner join gestion.sub_categoria b on b.id = a.id_sub_categoria
											inner join gestion.extra_categoria c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
											inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
											where 
											a.id_sub_categoria = 7 and a.id_extra_categoria = 27
											and e.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
											and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.sub_categoria b on b.id = a.id_sub_categoria
inner join gestion.extra_categoria c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
inner join gestion.responsable e on e.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
where 
a.id_sub_categoria = 7 and a.id_extra_categoria = 27
and e.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6)

list.definition: SELECT name FROM gestion.category where parent in (9)
list.label: CATEGORIA
list.name: categoria
list.query: SELECT name FROM gestion.category where parent in (9)

list.definition: SELECT name FROM gestion.category where parent = 60
list.label: NUEVAS CATEGORIAS
list.name: categnuevas
list.query: SELECT name FROM gestion.category where parent = 60

list.definition: SELECT  nombre FROM gestion.estado WHERE id < 25 order by id
list.label: ESTADOS
list.name: estado
list.query: SELECT  nombre FROM gestion.estado WHERE id < 25 order by id

list.definition: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estado)
list.label: MUNICIPIO
list.name: municipio
list.query: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estado)
